tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very quick service the next day. No pressure to carry out treatment as I didn’t have much time left in Delhi. Would recommend highly

Doctor is well known about the treatment. Before the treatment, explains in details about the surgery, advantages of the same, etc. Done the total surgery in well planned manner. No pain in entire surgery. The staff was well mannered, cooperative and soft spoken. The clinic was clean and all the equipment used were clean and placed in order. After treatment doctor explained in detail about post treatment precautions foe early recovery. As I am fully satisfied with the overall treatment, behavior, I will fully recommend for the doctor and this clinic.
reply_text: Thank u so much for kind words....Need your continuous Blessings....

review: Dr kapil Garg was referred by one of close friends of mine who is also a professional dental surgeon .I visited at his clinic to get the swelling/pus on my gum checked .He helped in saving my teeth instead of directly going for surgery by doing Re RCT .We found his approach suitable in dealing with the dental issues and hope to get good experience like this in future too with him .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The overall experience was more than satisfactory.
1. Dental Clinic is pristinely clean.One of the most important features expected in a dental clinic.
2. The doctor is very polite and friendly along with being well versed with the professional nitty gritties.
3. MOST IMPORTANT : GOLD STANDARD DENTISTRY.
Highly recommended.If you chose Dr.Kapil Garg for your dental issues,rest assured that you will be in safe hands!
